item.description:
This is going to be a HUGE... game for the New England Patriots. Currently the Saints are one of ONLY two undefeated teams left in the NFL and are considered to have the best offense in the game of football. Come and watch this clash of the titans - Tom Brady and The New England Patriots vs. Drew Brees and the New Orleans Saints.

The game begins at 8:30PM but you'll need to get there earlier to help me with saving seats.

Cheers!!!


About Clarke's:
Established in 1974, "Clarke's at Faneuil Hall" is a fixture in Boston's Historic Faneuil Hall. Since its opening, Clarke's has been known as "the" bar to frequent. It has great music and is a fantastic place to meet people. In addition to its friendly atmosphere, it has an extensive and eclectic menu, which includes mouth-watering burgers, salads, seafood, kabobs, wraps, soups, sandwiches, appetizers and more.

Open 7 days a week!
11:30am - 02:00am

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: A Big Game!! Monday Night Footall - New England vs. New Orleans
